puzzle.title: The Claim of Absolute Authority
puzzle.intro: In ancient times, a powerful individual rose to dominion over a vast land and its inhabitants. This figure's reign was marked by immense pride and a profound challenge to divine authority. Prepare to uncover the identity of a soul whose ultimate fate became a lasting lesson for all generations.
clues: I held sway over a mighty empire, where my word was law.
I declared myself the supreme deity, demanding worship from all under my rule.
I oppressed a specific community, enslaving them and ordering the killing of their infant males.
I was repeatedly confronted by a humble messenger of God, who performed clear miracles before me and my magicians.
I stubbornly rejected the truth, accusing the messenger of sorcery and plotting to destroy him and his followers.
My entire army and I were engulfed by the sea as we relentlessly pursued those who had been freed from my grasp.
puzzle.arabic: فَأَتْبَعَهُمْ فِرْعَوْنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمْ
puzzle.verse: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them, (20:78)
